person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I see in him the profile of a secretray-general of the United Nations and I have given my endorsement . "

Let's think step by step.

1. him: This refers to the person being described in the paragraph.
2. a secretrary-general of the United Nations: This is a title or role, but it implies a specific person holding that position.

So, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. him (the person being described)
2. a secretrary-general of the United Nations (implies a specific person holding that position)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

The only entity that clearly refers to a person in the paragraph is:

1. him (the person being described)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I see in him the profile of a secretray-general of the United Nations and I have given my endorsement . "

Let's think step by step.

1. United Nations

The United Nations is an international organization founded in 1945. It is headquartered at 405 East 42nd Street, New York, New York, NY 10017, USA. The Secretary-General is the chief administrative officer of the UN and is responsible for leading the organization's global efforts and acting as a spokesperson for the international community. Therefore, the term "United Nations" and the role of "Secretary-General" are both entities related to location in this context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

The relevant location entity in the paragraph is:

1. United Nations (headquarters)

The United Nations is an international organization with its headquarters located at 405 East 42nd Street, New York, New York, NY 10017, USA.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
